metadata.name: A friend in need
metadata.description:
“A friend in need” is one of the painting of dogs playing poker series by Cassius Marcellus Coolidge.
In a masterpiece “A Friend in Need” are a couple of dogs playing Poker with pepe mask at a round table. we can see a pair of bulldogs playing against the five hounds. It is depicted as a friend who helps the other friend in need, just like the name suggests.
